snippet: Mr. Basilio stepped up a weight class when he beat Sugar Ray Robinson in a split decision for his middleweight crown in 1957 at Yankee Stadium, but lost to him in 1958.
abstract: Carmen Basilio, welterweight and middleweight boxing champion of 1950s who fought two brutal bouts with Sugar Ray Robinson, winning his middleweight title and then losing it to him, dies at age 85.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Basilio stepped up a weight class when he beat Sugar Ray Robinson in a split decision for his middleweight crown in 1957 at Yankee Stadium, but lost to him in 1958.

headline.seo: Carmen Basilio, Boxer Who Beat Sugar Ray Robinson for Title, Dies at 85
headline.main: Carmen Basilio Dies at 85; Took Title From Robinson
headline.print_headline: Carmen Basilio Dies at 85; Took Title From Robinson
